{{menutrail|Main menu|Options menu}} [[File:MiscOptions.png|thumb|The misc options menu in [[Doom]].]] The '''miscellaneous options''' menu contains all important settings that do not really fit anywhere else yet would not justify having a menu all of their own. Its [[MENUDEF]] name is <tt>MiscOptions</tt>. *'''{{LE|Merge left+right Alt/Ctrl/Shift|k_mergekeys}}''' (On/Off) (Win32 only) :<tt>{{CVAR|C|k_mergekeys}}</tt> :If set to "on", [[ZDoom]] will make no distinction between the left and the right versions of the "alt", "ctrl" and "shift" keys. *'''{{LE|Alt-Enter toggles fullscreen|k_allowfullscreentoggle}}''' (On/Off) (Win32 only) :<tt>{{CVAR|C|k_allowfullscreentoggle}}</tt> :If set to "on", hitting the Alt+Enter key combination toggles between fullscreen and windowed mode, following the Windows convention. *'''{{LE|Show IWAD selection dialog|queryiwad}}''' (On/Off) :<tt>{{CVAR|C|queryiwad}}</tt> :Display the [[IWAD selection box]] on startup. Note that it will be skipped anyway if a mod is loaded with a [[GAMEINFO]] lump specifying an [[IWAD]].
*'''{{LE|View bobbing while flying|fviewbob}}''' (On/Off) :{{c|{{CVAR|C|fviewbob}}}} :Toggles player's view bobbing while flying on or off. *'''{{LE|Enable cheats from all games|allcheats}}''' (On/Off) :<tt>{{CVAR|C|allcheats}}</tt> :If this option is on, then [[cheat code]]s from any of the supported games work in all other games as well. In case of conflict, such as the IDDQD "trap" in [[Heretic]], the normal cheat code is the one that takes effect. *'''{{LE|Enable autosaves|disableautosave}}''' (Off/On) :<tt>{{CVAR|C|disableautosave}}</tt> :This option lets you turn off the autosaves created upon entering a level. Be warned that with this option turned off you will not be able to resume the game in a [[hub]] after you die. *'''{{LE|Save/Load confirmation|saveloadconfirmation}}''' (On/Off) :<tt>{{CVAR|C|saveloadconfirmation}}</tt> :Controls whether a confirmation dialog is displayed or not when performing {{CCMD|O|quicksave}} and {{CCMD|O|quickload}}. *'''{{LE|Number of autosaves|autosavecount}}''' (1—20) :<tt>{{CVAR|C|autosavecount}}</tt> :Allows to choose the number of autosave files used by ZDoom. If the chosen value is more than one, there is a rotation to prevent overwriting the most recent autosaves.
*'''{{LE|Cache nodes|gl_cachenodes}}''' (On/Off) :<tt>{{CVAR|C|gl_cachenodes}}</tt> :Chooses whether generated [[GL node]]s are cached or not. *'''{{LE|Time threshold for node caching|gl_cachetime}}''' (0.0—2.0, by 0.1 increments) :<tt>{{CVAR|C|gl_cachetime}}</tt> :Determines the minimum length, in seconds, that GL nodes generation must take to trigger node caching. *'''{{LE|Clear node cache|clearnodecache}}''' :<tt>{{CCMD|O|clearnodecache}}</tt> :Deletes the current cached nodes. This runs a [[console command]], instead of changing a [[console variable]]!
